reviews.text: Right on the river in Old Bagan so very near to many pagodas. Quiet and peaceful. Hairdryer in room. Lovely pool view from balcony of room 515. Big room with large bathroom. Toiletries are not expensive ones. Two free bottles of water per day. Safe works and is large enough for a smaller laptop. A/C can get a little noisy at times but it works well. Get your laundry done here; low prices compared to everywhere else. Room lighting is a bit dim. Americans won’t need an electrical adapter. King of Mongolia also staying at this property the first night of my stay. Slow dinner service in the restaurant; OUR tour staff was serving and clearing! Housekeeping seems to come later in the day. Bar and minibar prices are high. Hotel has a generator for power backup; it did go on at least a couple of times during my 3-night stay. Staff at breakfast is not good about clearing and re-setting tables for those coming next. I lost my hat one day on the way out, and the front desk had it for me when I went looking later in the day. Slow wifi.
reviews.title: Nice

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is a wonderful hotel in a great location--on beautiful grounds but within walking or biking distance to many of the historic sites. The rooms were clean and airy and the service was great. The restaurant was empty when we were there, which was too bad since the food was quite good and reasonably priced. The Internet did not work well in the rooms but this seemed to be a problem in several places we stayed in Myanmar.
reviews.title: Wonderful place to stay on Bagan

reviews.text: Well located in old bagan. Our room had views of the stupas and was large, clean and bug free. The pool area is pleasant and there is a lawn at the back of the hotel to watch sunset over the river. Food in the restaurant - we had Myanmar curries - was very good. With all the temples to see in bagan you hardly get to enjoy the nice things at this hotel, which also has a spa.
reviews.title: Great location and river views.

reviews.text: Booked 2 nights here for a visit to Bagan and the surrounding area. I wanted somewhere in Old Bagan so that I could walk and cycle around the area at my own leisure and this place didn't disappoint with it's location.
reviews.title: Lovely spot in Old Bagan, walking distance to the sights.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I arrived very early on a flight from Yangon, so even after a trip around a few of the larger temples I was ready for a shower and a rest by 11am. Headed over to the hotel who kindly allowed me to check-in early. I'd booked a river view room, which was literally right on the banks of the river, nice to sit ont eh balcony watching the longtail boats pulling in and unloading (mainly seemed to be large earthenware pots!)
reviews.title: Functional but lacking heart & soul…
